FUTURAMA
Episode 512
SPANISH FRY
Ron Weiner Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. A remixed version of theme tune is performed. Caption: Thanks For Watching, Futurama Slave Army (in AL1).
The Planet Express ship flies over Duraflame National Forest and lands at a camping site.
Forest. The entire Planet Express staff are on a company outing and are hiking through the woods.
xml.speak: Oh Lord. Hiking is always such a strain on the buttocks.
xml.info: He isn't actually walking, he is sat on a giant pair of legs about 5ft high. A noise noises.
xml.speak: Shh! What was that sound?
It wasn't a bird's nest falling. That sounds like this. Aww, they're so cute when they're scared!
I meant the sound Bigfoot just made. He's been sighted a lot in this area recently. Just last week a blind hiker felt him!
Don't tell me you actually believe in Bigfoot you blathering ninny-hammer!
Of course I do! Bigfoot's my hero. Growing up, he was the celebrity I most identified with.
Why?
'Cause he was a loner who hated the popular monsters yet longed to be one.
(sadly) I can so relate to that.
xml.info: He cries and hugs Leela. She isn't impressed.
xml.speak: Ugh, enough emotions! This isn't a fat camp for God sake. (quietly) Though you wouldn't know it from looking.
xml.info: Campsite. The crew set up camp. Zoidberg eats something, Leela and Amy set up their pop-up tent, Fry hammers his tent pegs into the ground with a frying pan and Bender lazes around with his arms and legs tied round a tree so it looks like he is lying in a hammock.
xml.speak: Ahh!
Bender, if you want to sleep in the tent tonight, you're welcome to join me and Hermes for a little "just friends" spooning.
Nah, I'm comfy out here under the stars. Real comfy!
xml.info: Ranger Station. The Planet Express employees and other campers are gathered in the log building. The ranger has set up a projection screen at the front of the room and they all sit on rowed benches.
xml.speak: Hey I'm Ranger Park the park ranger.
I get it!
Now since this area's a National Bigfoot Reserve we'll start with a short film about Bigfoot while I make a few phonecalls.
xml.info: He dims the lights and turns on the projector. "Bigfoot" appears on the screen.
xml.speak: That proves it!
xml.info: In the movie the Clearcutter cuts down some trees.
Park talks on the phone at the back of the room.
xml.speak: It should say "Top Quality Exercycle For Sale" and could you put "Top Quality" in bold...? You can't? OK whatever.
xml.info: In the movie someone photographs the woods.
The movie ends with "The End" and "MMCMLXII "- Most Rights Reserved." Park hangs up.
xml.speak: I-I gotta call you back. Alright, questions?
Yeah. Have yous ever seens Bigfeet?
Technically no. But I do see him each night in my dreams and each day in the silent faces of hairy children.
xml.info: Farnsworth stands up and shakes his fist.
xml.speak: (shouting) Bunk! Bunk I say! Bring me a bag full of Bigfoot's droppings or shut up!
Shut up!
xml.info: Bender stands up and points out the window.
xml.speak: Oh my God its Bigfoot!
xml.info: Park holds up a camera and autograph book and runs to the window.
xml.speak: Where?
Eh he's gone. He says you should keep wasting your life though.
Oh! I saw Bigfoot crushing cars at the county fair!
What you saw was Bigfoot the monster truck. But thanks for a great question.
Ohh...
xml.info: She walks out muttering. Fry puts his hand up.
xml.speak: Sir, if I may, why don't you set up like a billion video cameras in the woods and see if he walks by one.
Ah, that would be very expensive. And most people who believe in Bigfoot are broke.
Hey look! Bigfoot! He's back!
xml.info: Park falls for it again.
xml.speak: Where?
Up your face! Everybody do the Bender!
xml.info: And he does.
Campsite. Night has fallen. Leela and Amy lie on a blanket while the others sit around the fire.
xml.speak: The sky out here is amazing. Look at all those satellites.
xml.info: The satellites fly around the sky like shooting stars. A Bachelor Chow ad flies by along with a Drink Shiz! ad and one that reads Top Quality Exercycle For Sale.
Time Lapse. Everyone has turned in for the night.
xml.speak: Goodnight employess.
xml.info: He disappears into his tent.
xml.speak: Goodnight.
Goodnight Hubert.
xml.info: He and Hermes' silhouettes lie down. Amy's nude silhouette zips closed her and Leela's tent. Leela's silhouette sprays her boots with something. Fry pokes his head of his tent.
xml.speak: You doin' alright out there buddy?
xml.info: Bender's head lights up like an insectocutor.
xml.speak: Better than these gnats! That guy won't be goin' home to his kids!
xml.info: Time Lapse. Everyone is sound asleep. Bender shivers and rotates his head around him like an owl. Something coos.
xml.speak: Who's that? A wolf? Or some kind of boogen? Oh God I wish I was safe inside a tent. (deep voice) Fry, Fry wake up! It's me! Bigface!
xml.info: Cut to: Fry's Tent. Fry wakes up.
Cut to: Campsite. Fry emerges from his tent brushing his teeth.
xml.speak: Bigfoot? Bigfoot?
xml.info: He runs off into the woods. Bender emerges from the rock, chuckling. He crawls into Fry's tent, crawls around panting like a dog and finally lies down and turns out the light.
Cut to: Forest.
xml.speak: Bigfoot? Is that you? I'm not like the others Bigfoot. I see through your monster coatings to the gentle loner inside. I bet you have a wounded racoon friend that you tenderly nurse back to health and go......and in the end they shoot you. But you teach us about things. Oh, it's a flying saucer. (shouting) Excuse me? You can't park here. The parking area's over there. Wow nice tube! Hey. Hey what's the big idea? Stop abducting me. Why does your vanity plate say "Probe 1"?
xml.info: He screams as he disappears inside the ship. The pipe retracts back into the ship and it heads skyward.
Campsite. Morning has broken. Everyone crawls out of their tents and yawn and stretch. Leela walks down the river and dunks her hands in.
xml.speak: There's nothing so refreshing as the clean, crisp taste of old Canadian beer!
xml.info: She pulls a bottle out of the river and downs it. Hermes juggles a toilet roll in his hands.
xml.speak: Well, see you in an hour. I gotta go do some business behind that tree.
xml.info: Behind the tree Hermes attaches the toilet roll to a calculator and does some business - calculations. Bender struggles inside Fry's tent and finally rips it apart and stands up.
xml.speak: Bender, wasn't that Fry's tent?
xml.info: Bender makes mocking noises.
xml.speak: Bender raises a good point, where is Fry?
xml.info: Cut to: Forest. Fry stumbles through the thicket with his back turned ï¿½ la The Blair Witch Project. A rat pokes its head out of a packet of Cheez Nubs and screams.
Cut to: Campsite. Fry reaches the edge of the woods and walks into the campsite, still with his back turned. He sounds like his nose is blocked.
xml.speak: Amy, you won't believe what happened......it was so scary that you wouldn't - I know but listen it gets even scarier.
Fry! What in Sega Genesis happened to you?
That's what I'm trying to tell you. See - Why are you all staring at me like that? Is there something on my face?
Uh...no.
xml.info: Fry has no nose.
xml.speak: Someone should tell him.
Tell me what?
Nothing.

Well I have a lot of experience telling patients bad news so, let me break it to him gently. (shouting) Fry you have no nose! Your nose is gone! You have no nose on your face! Where it is I can't say but on your face it's not!
What?
xml.info: He pokes his face and looks at his refelction in Bender's door. He screams.
xml.speak: Aww, I think it's sweet! You chopped off your nose so you could look more like your hero. Me, Bender!
Which last night?
In the woods, I was walking. For Bigfoot, looking and then aliens beamed me up.
Were they little grey dudes with big oval heads? I don't get that gesture. Am I wrong?
Cheer up friend. When we get home a high quality prosthesis will have you looking good as new.
xml.info: Fry smiles.
Planet Express: Meeting Room. Fry is sat at the table wearing joke glasses, nose and moustache.
xml.speak: I'm a pathetic freak. My life is ruined.
xml.info: Hermes laughs.
xml.speak: Man, you are such a jokester!
I'll never have another moment of happiness.
xml.info: Everyone else falls about laughing.
xml.speak: I know you're trying to mask your pain with humour but don't worry. I'm sure the Professor can clone you a new nose.
Well there's no sense fretting. Good Lord you're ugly! The fact is your nose is gone and we'll never find out who did it or why.
xml.info: Enter Bender panting and gasping.
xml.speak: (gasping) Guys, guys! There's something on television.
xml.info: Spin to: Planet Express: Lounge. The crew sit and stand, watching a news report.
xml.speak: ON TV Alien abductions: Until now, a harmless nuisance. But recently they've taken on a sinister dimension as unsuspecting victims are returned...without noses!
xml.info: Behind her a picture of a normal man changes to a picture of a man with no nose.
xml.speak: Like me!
ON TV The culprits: Shameless poachers, hunting humans without a permit.
xml.info: The scene on TV changes to a picture of a grey alien with a gun over his shoulder. He holds a nose. Back to the studio.
xml.speak: ON TV The valuable nose or "human horn" fetches a high price on alien worlds as an aphrodisiac.
My nose is an aphrodisiac? I'm gonna drop a barf!
ON TV Demand for human horn is great. Due in part to titilating scenes from depraved alien TV programmes too filthy for Earth broadcast. Let's watch.
xml.info: The scene changes to two Neptunian lovers on a bed together. The man holds up a cushion with two human horns on it. The woman gasps.
He grates a horn onto her shoulder and licks it off. They make out. Fry turns the TV off.
xml.speak: Blech! We have to track down my nose before some alien snarfs it and does the worm. Who's in?
xml.info: Leela stand up.
xml.speak: Me and Bender and maybe Zoidberg if he feels like it.
No I'm good.
xml.info: The ship flies towards the huge Galalctic Bazaar: Offering Legal Items etc. It is a run down space station with things sticking out of it.

Cut to: Galactic Bazaar. The place is filled with aliens. The trio walk past Joe Camel who tries on some shades. Fry is wearing a strap on red nose. They walk past a stall where an alien buys something.
xml.speak: Lets see, I'll have a pancreas, two sphincters and a large colon.
It's no use. We've been to ever scuzzy bazaar in the galaxy, including Pottery Barn.
Wait, what's that?
xml.info: She points at The Beast With Two Bucks Sex Shoppe.
Cut to: Sex Shoppe. Enter Fry, Bender and Leela. The salesman has a chameleon-like head.
xml.speak: Welcome friends. How may I pervert you?
Uh, I'm looking for human horn.
(whispering) Shh! You're not cops right?
Of course not. In fact he's a crook.
xml.info: She points at Bender.
xml.speak: Yep. Stolen Pez anyone?
xml.info: He holds up a Calculon-head Pez thing and hands them around. The salesman eats it and pulls back a curtain.
xml.speak: Right this way.
xml.info: Back Room. The salesman gets something from off a high shelf and unwraps it. Inside is lots of human noses.
xml.speak: Human horn. So fresh you can still see the eyeglass marks.
xml.info: Fry looks at the noses.
xml.speak: Nope, uh-uh, eww! Now look, this is the nose we want. Did you sell it to somebody?
I'm sorry sir but due to the perverted nature of our business, customer records are strictly confidential. Right this way.
xml.info: Cut to: Back Back Room. The salesman pulls another curtain across. In the room is a TV and a wall lined with video tapes.
xml.speak: I video tape everyone who comes in here so I can blackmail them later. Hey, I'm a porno dealing monster, what do I care what you think? Here's the weirdo who bought your horn.
xml.info: He puts the tape in the machine. On the screen a familiar alien walks into the Sex Shoppe badly disguised. Leela gasps.
xml.speak: That's Lrrr! Ruler of the planet Omicron Persei 8!
ON TV You got any uh, you know...
ON TV Speak up! You're muttering!
ON TV I said uh... (whispering) human horn?
ON TV Oh no no, I'm just some guy. Ruler of the planet Omicron Persei 8!
xml.info: The dealer hands him a horn over the counter. Fry and Leela nod to each other.
The ship flies toward Omicron Persei 8 and lands outside the castle.
Omicroninan Castle. Lrrr and Nd-Nd sit on thrones. Guards stand either side of the trio who stand before Lrrr and Nd-Nd.
xml.speak: So let me get this straight: If I buy eight caramello bars, you all get to go to some camp.
Yep. That's exactly the lie we used to get past your guards.
xml.info: Fry steps forward and bows.
xml.speak: Oh great space king. I humbly beg you to return my human horn.
xml.info: Lrrr acts like he doesn't know what Fry is talking about.
xml.speak: Uh, human horn? How ridiculous! Why would virile male like Lrrr need human horn? I don't even know what it's for. What is it, something you-you put in salad dressing?
Like you've ever seen a salad.
My weight is appropriate and attractive!
Whoa, you guys have issues!
She has issues! I'm fine! But there's no human horn around here so, make friends with the door.
(sadly) Alright. I give up. I guess I'll just go home and marry a skunk.
xml.info: He cries.
xml.speak: Oh let's just give it to him. Here.
My nose! Light of my face!
Uh, what is that? How do you have that Nd-Nd? I've never seen it before. My friend left it here.
xml.info: Fry takes his nose out of the box and puts it on his face.
xml.speak: Hold still Fry. I can reattach it with my emergency face laser.
xml.info: She presses a button on her wristamajig and a beam seams the nose to Fry's face. It also burns his cheek a little.
xml.speak: Hey! You burned my cheek!
Yeah sorry I wasn't really concentrating.
No I mean the singed flesh, I can smell it! Those lilacs on the table.
At least someone noticed.
For the last time I don't like lilacs! Your first wife was the one who liked lilacs.
She also liked to shut up!
Well, great seeing you, I guess we'll be on our -
Yo, highness! Uh, just out of robo-curiosity, why would you use a guy's nose for an aphrodisiac instead of his...you know...wing dang doodle?
But I thought the horn was the human wing dang doodle?
No sir-chee! The main event, so to speak, is downstairs near the wallet. Ever seen soccer players line up to block a free kick? They ain't covering their noses I'll say that much! Well, seeya!
xml.info: He starts to leave.
xml.speak: Interesting. The trousers conceal a tiny secondary horn.
Hey, what've you heard?
(shouting) Guards! Seize him! Prepare to harvest the lower horn!
xml.info: Fry looks around scared.
xml.speak: OK, you can have my nose.
xml.info: He pulls it off.
xml.speak: Guards!
Yeah?
Remove the human's lower horn and prepare it to be eaten by me.
In other words slop a lot of ketchup and salt on it!
Then bring it to our royal bedchamber and put it in the sock drawer with all the other things that have failed to arouse my passion for this woman.
xml.info: The second guard takes out a whizzy buzzy cutting thing. Fry squeals.
xml.speak: Remove pants!
Wait! I'm usually the first guy to toot my own lower horn -
(shouting) I'll say!
xml.info: He hoots.
xml.speak: But in this case I just don't think it'll do any good.
(shouting) That's what she said!
xml.info: He hoots again.
xml.speak: Let's face it. You two have deep relationship problems that can't be solved by an aphrodisiac.
However huge it might be.
So what do you suggest, painfully single human?
Well, why don't you think back to what brought you together in the first place?
Ohh I don't know. Lrrr used to be so tender.
xml.info: Lrrr groans.
xml.speak: I only wrote that poem to test my printer.
We'd go walking in the woods and Lrrr would find injured little tinkle-bunnies and nurse them back to health.
Yes but I'm the one who injured them!
Oh shush. You stepped on them by accident and then you cried all night. That's the kind of sensitive man you used to be.
And you used to wear a size-3 cape. (shouting) But not anymore! Now bring me that lower horn while I'm still in the mood.
xml.info: The guard starts the whizzy thing again.
xml.speak: Wh-What if we helped you get your passion back without the hassle of mutilating me?
Yeah, we know a great place in the mountains. We could take you there for a romantic dinner under the stars.
Hmm, sounds interesting. But he would never do it.
Like hell I wouldn't. I'm not gonna be blamed for not going!
Then it's a deal. We get one night. I keep my horn as long as you two end up doing the horizontal monster mash.
xml.info: Bender hoots, laughs insanely and chuckles.
xml.speak: I don't get it!
xml.info: Forest. Back at Duraflame Lrrr and Nd-Nd are seated at a table at night. The trees around them have lights strung around them. Enter Bender carrying a box of Monsieur Carton.
xml.speak: Bonjour. May I offer you a box of wine for the edge of the table?
No thanks. Just water please. Tap water!
(sarcastic) Oh big spender!
(shouting) That's it, this date is over! Waiter!
xml.info: The guards wheel Fry up to the table in a cage. He is dressed in a snappy suit.
xml.speak: So, what can I get you this evening?
Your lower horn!
xml.info: Fry squeals.
xml.speak: I'll just start you off with some bread. Some sexy, arousing bread!
Fine but none of that whole-grain goat food! And bring plenty of melted butter.
xml.info: Nd-Nd groans.
xml.speak: Why don't you just inject some fat straight into your ass and cut out the middle man!
One of these days Nd-Nd, bang, zoom, straight to the third moon of Omicron Persei 8!
xml.info: Time Lapse. Lrrr and Nd-Nd are still eating and Fry is still in his cage. A guard is sat by a tree.
xml.speak: EATING Mmm, this jerked chicken is good! I think I'll have Fry's lower horn jerked.
(shouting) It's used to it!
xml.info: He hoots. Fry is wheeled to the table.
xml.speak: So uh, how are you two sneaky poopums doing?
Poorly.
My wife is right for once. There is very little magic in the air. Ready the lower horn transport vessel.
xml.info: A guard pours some ice into a cooler. Fry squeals.
xml.speak: Boy, who knew a cooler could also make a handy wang coffin? Hey, uh mind if I stick these in here?
Go for it.
Don't worry Fry. Things look bad but I still have a trump card. The most beautiful love song ever written. (singing badly) And I will always love you......will always love you...
The humans are attacking.
Pluck the lower horn and let's get out of here!
xml.info: The guard starts the cutter.
xml.speak: Quick Fry, run for it!
xml.info: He pushes Fry's cage and it rolls away, bouncing down hills and through trees.
xml.speak: Come on freedom cage! Roll me to safety! Yes! I never thought I'd escape with my doodle, but I pulled it out!
(shouting) Just like at the movie theatre!
xml.info: He hoots and Lrrr grabs Fry.
xml.speak: Give me that!
xml.info: Fry screams. The guard starts the whizzer and the other opens the cooler. Leela gasps. Something growls. Bigfoot emerges from the trees.
xml.speak: Bigfoot! He's real! I knew it. The Loch Ness Monster's book was right!
xml.info: Bigfoot stops and sniffs the Omicronians.
xml.speak: Well, hello there my furry friend.
Look at his adorable little feet. Yes you are a cutie-pie.
xml.info: Enter Ranger Park with his camera.
xml.speak: Holy macaroni! I can't believe I'm seeing Bigfoot! He's in focus! Oh I've waited my entire life for this moment!
xml.info: He pulls a gun out from behind him and points it at Bigfoot. Everyone mumbles.
xml.speak: What are you doing with that?
xml.info: Lrrr steps forward.
xml.speak: You're going to kill this innocent giganto?
Of course not. I'm just gonna tranquilise him so I can chop off his feet as proof he exists. Then dump him back in the wild. He'll do fine.
xml.info: He aims the gun. Lrrr steps in front. Nd-Nd stands at his side.
xml.speak: You'll have to get through me first.
OK, nighty nght.
xml.info: He shoots but the tranquiliser dart bounces off Lrrr. Lrrr vapourises the gun.
xml.speak: Now leave this gentle sasquatch - or wood ape - in peace so I can finally and at long last harvest this pathetic human's lower horn.
Yeah!
xml.info: He screams.
xml.speak: Wait. What am I saying? If I poach this beast's lower horn, am I any better than that ranger with his demented foot lust? Yes. But not by enough.
xml.info: Park walks behind Bigfoot and cuts off a tuft of his fur.
xml.speak: Score!
xml.info: Bigfoot scratches himself.
xml.speak: This human's lower horn is one of God's creatures, a living thing. And all living things, large and small...
(shouting) In this case "small"!
xml.info: He hoots.
xml.speak: ...have diginity. And a spark of divine.
xml.info: He cries.
xml.speak: That's the gentle sensitive poet warlord I fell in love with!
xml.info: She hugs him and they both crush Fry between them. He squeezes his way out. Lrrr and Nd-Nd kiss. Bender, Fry and Leela avoid watching.
xml.speak: (shouting) Uh, you'll wanna retreat to a safe, 500 metre radius!
xml.info: They start running.
xml.speak: Well Fry, it looks like you get to hold onto your lower horn.
As usual! (shouting) Run away!
xml.info: They leg it and Bigfoot stays and watches Lrrr and Nd-Nd on the floor. Then he walks off into the thick forest.
Closing Credits. Over the credits a deleted scene from The Birdbot Of Ice-Catraz is played. It is an episode of The Scary Door. The opening titles play.
The Scary Door graphic appears on the TV and shatters. In a lab a mad scientist pours stuff from one bottle to another.
xml.speak: ON TV I have combined the DNA of the world's most evil animals, to make the most evil creature of them all.
xml.info: He pours the liquid into a machine and it crackles and a door in it opens. A man emerges from the smoke.
xml.speak: ON TV It turns out it's Man.
xml.info: Scary dramatic Scary Door music.
